title: BRIEF-Medallion Financial Qtrly ‍Net Investment Loss After Income Taxes Per Common Share​ $0.13
text:

* QTRLY ‍NET INVESTMENT LOSS AFTER INCOME TAXES PER COMMON SHARE​ $0.13 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
